Race.SpecificTitle: Constable -- Justice of the Peace District  2
PW- School Board -- $39,800,000 Bond - School Board - 20 Yr.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School District Proposition

Summary:  Authority to issue $39,800,000 of 20 year general obligation bonds of Parishwide School District of Beauregard Parish to pay the cost of renovating, improving, equipping and furnishing school buildings and school related facilities throughout the District, substantially in accordance with the resolution adopted by the Parish School Board prior to this election specifying the renovations and improvements to be made with bond proceeds, said bonds to be payable from ad valorem taxes.
Race.FullText: Shall Parishwide School District of the Parish of Beauregard, State of Louisiana (the "District"), incur debt and issue bonds to the amount of Thirty-Nine Million Eight Hundred Thousand Dollars ($39,800,000), to run not exceeding twenty (20) years from date thereof, with interest at a rate not exceeding seven per centum (7%) per annum, for the purpose of acquiring and/or improving lands for building sites and playgrounds, if necessary, including construction of necessary sidewalks and streets adjacent thereto; purchasing, erecting and/or improving school buildings and other school related facilities within and for the District, and acquiring the necessary equipment and furnishings therefor, with the proceeds of the bonds to be first dedicated and expended to pay the cost of renovating, improving, equipping and furnishing school buildings and school related facilities throughout the District substantially in accordance with the resolution adopted by the Parish School Board prior to this election specifying the renovations and improvements to be made with bond proceeds, title to which shall be in the public, which bonds will be general obligations of the District, and will be payable from ad valorem taxes to be levied and collected in the manner provided by Article VI, Section 33 of the Constitution of the State of Louisiana of 1974, and statutory authority supplemental thereto?
